alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Morrill and southeastern Sioux Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 915 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Minatare, or 14 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Moomaws Corner around 930 PM MDT. The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62 around 945 PM MDT. Angora around 950 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
